text.en: ok.

text.en: right
text.de: right
text.fr: right

text.en: Excuse me, what are you... who are you?
text.de: Excuse me, what are you... who are you?
text.fr: Excuse me, what are you... who are you?
text.ru: Excuse me, what are you... who are you?

text.en: So you're the famous Jim Jode, the talk of the Royal Society!
text.de: So you're the famous Jim Jode, the talk of the Royal Society!
text.fr: So you're the famous Jim Jode, the talk of the Royal Society!
text.ru: So you're the famous Jim Jode, the talk of the Royal Society!

text.en: Please, Mr. Holmes. I've read Dr. Watsons stories. What are you doing here? Am I being accused of something?
text.de: Please, Mr. Holmes. I've read Dr. Watsons stories. What are you doing here? Am I being accused of something?
text.fr: Please, Mr. Holmes. I've read Dr. Watsons stories. What are you doing here? Am I being accused of something?
text.ru: Please, Mr. Holmes. I've read Dr. Watsons stories. What are you doing here? Am I being accused of something?

text.en: My name is Sherlock Holmes. Here with some questions I'd like you to answer.
text.de: My name is Sherlock Holmes. Here with some questions I'd like you to answer.
text.fr: My name is Sherlock Holmes. Here with some questions I'd like you to answer.
text.ru: My name is Sherlock Holmes. Here with some questions I'd like you to answer.

text.en: How do you mean? Am I being accused of something?
text.de: How do you mean? Am I being accused of something?
text.fr: How do you mean? Am I being accused of something?
text.ru: How do you mean? Am I being accused of something?

text.en: Professor Chauncey has been recently proclaimed dead. Do you know anything about it?
text.de: Professor Chauncey has been recently proclaimed dead. Do you know anything about it?
text.fr: Professor Chauncey has been recently proclaimed dead. Do you know anything about it?
text.ru: Professor Chauncey has been recently proclaimed dead. Do you know anything about it?

text.en: What? I... Goodness. We had our differences, but he didn't deserve it. Not at all.
text.de: What? I... Goodness. We had our differences, but he didn't deserve it. Not at all.
text.fr: What? I... Goodness. We had our differences, but he didn't deserve it. Not at all.
text.ru: What? I... Goodness. We had our differences, but he didn't deserve it. Not at all.

text.en: You seem to be a keen chemist. A fine hobby - I couldn't think of a better one myself.
text.de: You seem to be a keen chemist. A fine hobby - I couldn't think of a better one myself.
text.fr: You seem to be a keen chemist. A fine hobby - I couldn't think of a better one myself.
text.ru: You seem to be a keen chemist. A fine hobby - I couldn't think of a better one myself.

text.en: It's more than a hobby.
text.de: It's more than a hobby.
text.fr: It's more than a hobby.
text.ru: It's more than a hobby.

text.en: I aim to be the youngest member of the Royal Society of Chemistry. I have already found an existing member to sponsor me!
text.de: I aim to be the youngest member of the Royal Society of Chemistry. I have already found an existing member to sponsor me!
text.fr: I aim to be the youngest member of the Royal Society of Chemistry. I have already found an existing member to sponsor me!
text.ru: I aim to be the youngest member of the Royal Society of Chemistry. I have already found an existing member to sponsor me!

text.en: Professor Chauncey wanted you expelled, did he not?
text.de: Professor Chauncey wanted you expelled, did he not?
text.fr: Professor Chauncey wanted you expelled, did he not?
text.ru: Professor Chauncey wanted you expelled, did he not?

text.en: Yes, he did. We had our differences from the very beginning... Hold on, am I under suspicion?
text.de: Yes, he did. We had our differences from the very beginning... Hold on, am I under suspicion?
text.fr: Yes, he did. We had our differences from the very beginning... Hold on, am I under suspicion?
text.ru: Yes, he did. We had our differences from the very beginning... Hold on, am I under suspicion?

text.en: Mere idle curiosity on my part. I meant no insult.
text.de: Mere idle curiosity on my part. I meant no insult.
text.fr: Mere idle curiosity on my part. I meant no insult.
text.ru: Mere idle curiosity on my part. I meant no insult.

text.en: Hmph. None taken then.
text.de: Hmph. None taken then.
text.fr: Hmph. None taken then.
text.ru: Hmph. None taken then.

text.en: You can't deny you had a motive.
text.de: You can't deny you had a motive.
text.fr: You can't deny you had a motive.
text.ru: You can't deny you had a motive.

text.en: Yes I can. Sure we quarreled - he isn't- wasn't the easiest to get along with. But this is murder you are talking about!
text.de: Yes I can. Sure we quarreled - he isn't- wasn't the easiest to get along with. But this is murder you are talking about!
text.fr: Yes I can. Sure we quarreled - he isn't- wasn't the easiest to get along with. But this is murder you are talking about!
text.ru: Yes I can. Sure we quarreled - he isn't- wasn't the easiest to get along with. But this is murder you are talking about!

text.en: Can you recall where you were at the time the Professor died?
text.de: Can you recall where you were at the time the Professor died?
text.fr: Can you recall where you were at the time the Professor died?
text.ru: Can you recall where you were at the time the Professor died?

text.en: I see.
text.de: I see.
text.fr: I see.
text.ru: I see.

text.en: Absolutely. I was at home the whole time, right here.
text.de: Absolutely. I was at home the whole time, right here.
text.fr: Absolutely. I was at home the whole time, right here.
text.ru: Absolutely. I was at home the whole time, right here.

text.en: I ran experiments, dozens of them. Not all of them successful - I had to step outside and explain the smell to all the neighbours.
text.de: I ran experiments, dozens of them. Not all of them successful - I had to step outside and explain the smell to all the neighbours.
text.fr: I ran experiments, dozens of them. Not all of them successful - I had to step outside and explain the smell to all the neighbours.
text.ru: I ran experiments, dozens of them. Not all of them successful - I had to step outside and explain the smell to all the neighbours.

text.en: Let's not involve the bobbies, young Jim. I will depart immediately.
text.de: Let's not involve the bobbies, young Jim. I will depart immediately.
text.fr: Let's not involve the bobbies, young Jim. I will depart immediately.
text.ru: Let's not involve the bobbies, young Jim. I will depart immediately.

text.en: Now, if that is all, I need to leave in a moment, and I must ask you to leave, too. Otherwise I'll have to call the police.
text.de: Now, if that is all, I need to leave in a moment, and I must ask you to leave, too. Otherwise I'll have to call the police.
text.fr: Now, if that is all, I need to leave in a moment, and I must ask you to leave, too. Otherwise I'll have to call the police.
text.ru: Now, if that is all, I need to leave in a moment, and I must ask you to leave, too. Otherwise I'll have to call the police.

text.en: There you are, Tom Jode. How's your leg?
text.de: There you are, Tom Jode. How's your leg?
text.fr: There you are, Tom Jode. How's your leg?
text.ru: There you are, Tom Jode. How's your leg?

text.en: Why, what business is that of yours?
text.de: Why, what business is that of yours?
text.fr: Why, what business is that of yours?
text.ru: Why, what business is that of yours?

text.en: You have a brother called Jim, correct?
text.de: You have a brother called Jim, correct?
text.fr: You have a brother called Jim, correct?
text.ru: You have a brother called Jim, correct?

text.en: Oh, it's not me who got him into trouble.
text.de: Oh, it's not me who got him into trouble.
text.fr: Oh, it's not me who got him into trouble.
text.ru: Oh, it's not me who got him into trouble.

text.en: What do you need from him? You give him any trouble I'll break your bloody neck!
text.de: What do you need from him? You give him any trouble I'll break your bloody neck!
text.fr: What do you need from him? You give him any trouble I'll break your bloody neck!
text.ru: What do you need from him? You give him any trouble I'll break your bloody neck!

text.en: The sordid business of Professor Chauncey's death.
text.de: The sordid business of Professor Chauncey's death.
text.fr: The sordid business of Professor Chauncey's death.
text.ru: The sordid business of Professor Chauncey's death.

text.en: What are you talkin' 'bout? I don't know no professors, sir, I'm just a worker here!
text.de: What are you talkin' 'bout? I don't know no professors, sir, I'm just a worker here!
text.fr: What are you talkin' 'bout? I don't know no professors, sir, I'm just a worker here!
text.ru: What are you talkin' 'bout? I don't know no professors, sir, I'm just a worker here!

text.en: A superstitious man with a weak heart, scared to death by a Limping Devil - a roundabout method of murder, but it worked, didn't it?
text.de: A superstitious man with a weak heart, scared to death by a Limping Devil - a roundabout method of murder, but it worked, didn't it?
text.fr: A superstitious man with a weak heart, scared to death by a Limping Devil - a roundabout method of murder, but it worked, didn't it?
text.ru: A superstitious man with a weak heart, scared to death by a Limping Devil - a roundabout method of murder, but it worked, didn't it?

text.en: I... bollocks. Look, hear me out first.
text.de: I... bollocks. Look, hear me out first.
text.fr: I... bollocks. Look, hear me out first.
text.ru: I... bollocks. Look, hear me out first.

text.en: Let's see what you have to say.
text.de: Let's see what you have to say.
text.fr: Let's see what you have to say.
text.ru: Let's see what you have to say.

text.en: Jim told me everything about the guy, brother to brother. I did plan on givin' him a spook. Made that silly suit.
text.de: Jim told me everything about the guy, brother to brother. I did plan on givin' him a spook. Made that silly suit.
text.fr: Jim told me everything about the guy, brother to brother. I did plan on givin' him a spook. Made that silly suit.
text.ru: Jim told me everything about the guy, brother to brother. I did plan on givin' him a spook. Made that silly suit.

text.en: Wanted to make a scene, tell the man he was too old to make enemies. But when I woke him up he clutched his chest and went quiet.
text.de: Wanted to make a scene, tell the man he was too old to make enemies. But when I woke him up he clutched his chest and went quiet.
text.fr: Wanted to make a scene, tell the man he was too old to make enemies. But when I woke him up he clutched his chest and went quiet.
text.ru: Wanted to make a scene, tell the man he was too old to make enemies. But when I woke him up he clutched his chest and went quiet.

text.en: With a mind like yours you could excel at the university, Tom.
text.de: With a mind like yours you could excel at the university, Tom.
text.fr: With a mind like yours you could excel at the university, Tom.
text.ru: With a mind like yours you could excel at the university, Tom.

text.en: Aye, and who'd pay for it? Me and Jim got nobody. I figured I'd give one of us a chance.
text.de: Aye, and who'd pay for it? Me and Jim got nobody. I figured I'd give one of us a chance.
text.fr: Aye, and who'd pay for it? Me and Jim got nobody. I figured I'd give one of us a chance.
text.ru: Aye, and who'd pay for it? Me and Jim got nobody. I figured I'd give one of us a chance.

text.en: When someone threatened that, I had to act. But I swear, I didn't mean to kill the old man!
text.de: When someone threatened that, I had to act. But I swear, I didn't mean to kill the old man!
text.fr: When someone threatened that, I had to act. But I swear, I didn't mean to kill the old man!
text.ru: When someone threatened that, I had to act. But I swear, I didn't mean to kill the old man!

text.en: You should hope Inspector Lestrade finds your story convincing, because I don't. A murder is a murder.
text.de: You should hope Inspector Lestrade finds your story convincing, because I don't. A murder is a murder.
text.fr: You should hope Inspector Lestrade finds your story convincing, because I don't. A murder is a murder.
text.ru: You should hope Inspector Lestrade finds your story convincing, because I don't. A murder is a murder.

text.en: Sir, you are making a mistake! Who will pay for Jim's studies now?! What will he do?
text.de: Sir, you are making a mistake! Who will pay for Jim's studies now?! What will he do?
text.fr: Sir, you are making a mistake! Who will pay for Jim's studies now?! What will he do?
text.ru: Sir, you are making a mistake! Who will pay for Jim's studies now?! What will he do?

text.en: I have to admit, your creativity is incredibly amusing. For the sake of young Jim's future we will keep this between ourselves.
text.de: I have to admit, your creativity is incredibly amusing. For the sake of young Jim's future we will keep this between ourselves.
text.fr: I have to admit, your creativity is incredibly amusing. For the sake of young Jim's future we will keep this between ourselves.
text.ru: I have to admit, your creativity is incredibly amusing. For the sake of young Jim's future we will keep this between ourselves.

text.en: But once his studies are done...
text.de: But once his studies are done...
text.fr: But once his studies are done...
text.ru: But once his studies are done...

text.en: I will go to the police myself, sir. I promise you.
text.de: I will go to the police myself, sir. I promise you.
text.fr: I will go to the police myself, sir. I promise you.
text.ru: I will go to the police myself, sir. I promise you.

text.en: What happened here? Tell me everything.
text.de: What happened here? Tell me everything.
text.fr: What happened here? Tell me everything.
text.ru: What happened here? Tell me everything.

text.en: It was the devil! The devil came for our poor Professor and took his soul!
text.de: It was the devil! The devil came for our poor Professor and took his soul!
text.fr: It was the devil! The devil came for our poor Professor and took his soul!
text.ru: It was the devil! The devil came for our poor Professor and took his soul!

text.en: There was fire, and brimstone, and that horrible barking of his!
text.de: There was fire, and brimstone, and that horrible barking of his!
text.fr: There was fire, and brimstone, and that horrible barking of his!
text.ru: There was fire, and brimstone, and that horrible barking of his!

text.en: Did you catch the devil in the act, by any chance?
text.de: Did you catch the devil in the act, by any chance?
text.fr: Did you catch the devil in the act, by any chance?
text.ru: Did you catch the devil in the act, by any chance?

text.en: Of course not! I was terrified! I only saw his awful horned shadow as he lept into the window!
text.de: Of course not! I was terrified! I only saw his awful horned shadow as he lept into the window!
text.fr: Of course not! I was terrified! I only saw his awful horned shadow as he lept into the window!
text.ru: Of course not! I was terrified! I only saw his awful horned shadow as he lept into the window!

text.en: Barking, you said?
text.de: Barking, you said?
text.fr: Barking, you said?
text.ru: Barking, you said?

text.en: Yes. Barking like a hound dog! No ordinary human could make a noise like that!
text.de: Yes. Barking like a hound dog! No ordinary human could make a noise like that!
text.fr: Yes. Barking like a hound dog! No ordinary human could make a noise like that!
text.ru: Yes. Barking like a hound dog! No ordinary human could make a noise like that!

text.en: Fire and brimstone, you say?
text.de: Fire and brimstone, you say?
text.fr: Fire and brimstone, you say?
text.ru: Fire and brimstone, you say?

text.en: You can still smell it! Oh, our poor Professor...
text.de: You can still smell it! Oh, our poor Professor...
text.fr: You can still smell it! Oh, our poor Professor...
text.ru: You can still smell it! Oh, our poor Professor...

text.en: Thank you, your testimony was indispensable. That will be all.
text.de: Thank you, your testimony was indispensable. That will be all.
text.fr: Thank you, your testimony was indispensable. That will be all.
text.ru: Thank you, your testimony was indispensable. That will be all.

text.en: Linear dialog will be here
text.de: Linear dialog will be here
text.fr: Linear dialog will be here
text.ru: Linear dialog will be here

text.en: A dialog with two choices will be here
text.de: A dialog with two choices will be here
text.fr: A dialog with two choices will be here
text.ru: A dialog with two choices will be here

text.en: Hell yeah!
text.de: Hell yeah!
text.fr: Hell yeah!
text.ru: Hell yeah!

text.en: Nope.
text.de: Nope.
text.fr: Nope.
text.ru: Nope.

text.en: Will the dialog with three choices be here?
text.de: Will the dialog with three choices be here?
text.fr: Will the dialog with three choices be here?
text.ru: Will the dialog with three choices be here?

text.en: Yeah, sure
text.de: Yeah, sure
text.fr: Yeah, sure
text.ru: Yeah, sure

text.en: No way it cam fit
text.de: No way it cam fit
text.fr: No way it cam fit
text.ru: No way it cam fit

text.en: Think twice about it!
text.de: Think twice about it!
text.fr: Think twice about it!
text.ru: Think twice about it!

text.en: Good day, let me through, please! I've brought materials for Jim Jode.
text.de: Good day, let me through, please! I've brought materials for Jim Jode.
text.fr: Good day, let me through, please! I've brought materials for Jim Jode.
text.ru: Good day, let me through, please! I've brought materials for Jim Jode.

text.en: Dangerous materials, incredibly hazardous - only for proficient chemists, like me and Jim.
text.de: Dangerous materials, incredibly hazardous - only for proficient chemists, like me and Jim.
text.fr: Dangerous materials, incredibly hazardous - only for proficient chemists, like me and Jim.
text.ru: Dangerous materials, incredibly hazardous - only for proficient chemists, like me and Jim.

text.en: Slightest hand contact may cause stuttering, blindness and premature hair loss. Would you rather take them to Jim's room for me?
text.de: Slightest hand contact may cause stuttering, blindness and premature hair loss. Would you rather take them to Jim's room for me?
text.fr: Slightest hand contact may cause stuttering, blindness and premature hair loss. Would you rather take them to Jim's room for me?
text.ru: Slightest hand contact may cause stuttering, blindness and premature hair loss. Would you rather take them to Jim's room for me?

text.en: What materials? Who are you?!
text.de: What materials? Who are you?!
text.fr: What materials? Who are you?!
text.ru: What materials? Who are you?!

text.en: No, no! Goodness no, just go on. Good Lord, that Jode and his experiments!
text.de: No, no! Goodness no, just go on. Good Lord, that Jode and his experiments!
text.fr: No, no! Goodness no, just go on. Good Lord, that Jode and his experiments!
text.ru: No, no! Goodness no, just go on. Good Lord, that Jode and his experiments!

text.en: I shall only be a minute or two. Goodbye.
text.de: I shall only be a minute or two. Goodbye.
text.fr: I shall only be a minute or two. Goodbye.
text.ru: I shall only be a minute or two. Goodbye.

text.en: Good day to you, sir. My name is Sherlock Holmes...
text.de: Good day to you, sir. My name is Sherlock Holmes...
text.fr: Good day to you, sir. My name is Sherlock Holmes...
text.ru: Good day to you, sir. My name is Sherlock Holmes...

text.en: You are a witness to murder.
text.de: You are a witness to murder.
text.fr: You are a witness to murder.
text.ru: You are a witness to murder.

text.en: No-one has been charged yet.
text.de: No-one has been charged yet.
text.fr: No-one has been charged yet.
text.ru: No-one has been charged yet.

text.en: Thomas Garrett. Why am I here? "coughing"
text.de: Thomas Garrett. Why am I here? "coughing"
text.fr: Thomas Garrett. Why am I here? "coughing"
text.ru: Thomas Garrett. Why am I here? "coughing"

text.en: Of course. Well, it wouldn't be the first time that the police jailed an innocent man in order to close a case...
text.de: Of course. Well, it wouldn't be the first time that the police jailed an innocent man in order to close a case...
text.fr: Of course. Well, it wouldn't be the first time that the police jailed an innocent man in order to close a case...
text.ru: Of course. Well, it wouldn't be the first time that the police jailed an innocent man in order to close a case...

text.en: Yet... "coughing"
text.de: Yet... "coughing"
text.fr: Yet... "coughing"
text.ru: Yet... "coughing"

text.en: Did you perhaps see anything in particular during or after this disaster?
text.de: Did you perhaps see anything in particular during or after this disaster?
text.fr: Did you perhaps see anything in particular during or after this disaster?
text.ru: Did you perhaps see anything in particular during or after this disaster?

text.en: Yes, I saw part of your bourgeoisie burn up and explode... it was spectacular!
text.de: Yes, I saw part of your bourgeoisie burn up and explode... it was spectacular!
text.fr: Yes, I saw part of your bourgeoisie burn up and explode... it was spectacular!
text.ru: Yes, I saw part of your bourgeoisie burn up and explode... it was spectacular!

text.en: You have a severe cough. Are you suffering?
text.de: You have a severe cough. Are you suffering?
text.fr: You have a severe cough. Are you suffering?
text.ru: You have a severe cough. Are you suffering?

text.en: It's only a cold... "coughing"
text.de: It's only a cold... "coughing"
text.fr: It's only a cold... "coughing"
text.ru: It's only a cold... "coughing"

text.en: Why not be honest with me? You are spitting up black fluid.
text.de: Why not be honest with me? You are spitting up black fluid.
text.fr: Why not be honest with me? You are spitting up black fluid.
text.ru: Why not be honest with me? You are spitting up black fluid.

text.en: Ah!! Well observed... Yes, I have enough coal dust in my lungs to fuel an entire London district...
text.de: Ah!! Well observed... Yes, I have enough coal dust in my lungs to fuel an entire London district...
text.fr: Ah!! Well observed... Yes, I have enough coal dust in my lungs to fuel an entire London district...
text.ru: Ah!! Well observed... Yes, I have enough coal dust in my lungs to fuel an entire London district...

text.en: You were a miner then.
text.de: You were a miner then.
text.fr: You were a miner then.
text.ru: You were a miner then.

text.en: Since the age of thirteen, yes, at the Newcastle mines. Fifteen years of hell. Those were bloody times...
text.de: Since the age of thirteen, yes, at the Newcastle mines. Fifteen years of hell. Those were bloody times...
text.fr: Since the age of thirteen, yes, at the Newcastle mines. Fifteen years of hell. Those were bloody times...
text.ru: Since the age of thirteen, yes, at the Newcastle mines. Fifteen years of hell. Those were bloody times...

text.en: But now it's over. I don't want to die in those holes like my father and my brothers did, in order to line the pockets of the rich... "coughing"
text.de: But now it's over. I don't want to die in those holes like my father and my brothers did, in order to line the pockets of the rich... "coughing"

text.en: The best, kindest man in the world, now that master Dougal is gone! If I do well, they'll give me a chip!

text.en: Yes! One of them is killed, but the police can't find the other! Those fools only tell nonsence about magic!

text.ru: I guess your safe once belonged to a bank. Who could open it?

text.ru: You have some troubles in your family life, don't you?

text.fr: What? No, everything is fine! I love Augusta! Why do you even ask?
text.ru: What? No, everything is fine! I love Augusta! Why do you even ask?

text.fr: Your pocket watch is cleaned in a strange way. Everything is shining, except the inscription.
text.ru: Your pocket watch is cleaned in a strange way. Everything is shining, except the inscription.

text.ru: Huh... I usually ask Augusta to clean it. Never noticed it before.

text.ru: Changelings, Mr. Holmes! Veritable changelings. Small, green like frogs, and don't speak a lick of English.

text.ru: Where exactly did you find them?

text.en: Out on the Greentmantle Bogs. I go there to collect herbs. Me mother was a healer, taught me which ones to pick.

text.fr: Out on the Greentmantle Bogs. I go there to collect herbs. Me mother was a healer, taught me which ones to pick.

text.fr: When did you find these changelings?
text.ru: When did you find these changelings?

text.en: A couple of days ago. I cleaned them up and let them sleep under me roof. Fairies or not, ain't no such thing as "other people's children".

text.fr: Can I take a look at them?

text.en: Of course. But if you speak English, they'll just warble at you in their sweet fairie tongue.

text.fr: Of course. But if you speak English, they'll just warble at you in their sweet fairie tongue.

text.fr: Thank you. I will be back if I need anything.
text.ru: Thank you. I will be back if I need anything.

text.ru: For the Fair Folk I'd say this is too far from home.

text.fr: Have you lost a child, Miss Philipps?
text.ru: Have you lost a child, Miss Philipps?

text.fr: You obviously care for the ones you found, then there's you being a foreigner living here alone.
text.ru: You obviously care for the ones you found, then there's you being a foreigner living here alone.

text.fr: You're... you're correct of course, Mr. Holmes. I couldn't turn my back on these children, however they came to be on that bog.

text.fr: Does the police know you've found two children out on the bogs?
text.ru: Does the police know you've found two children out on the bogs?

text.ru: Still, they might have worried parents looking for them.

text.ru: Oh golly!

text.fr: It's likely the reason they are... socially stunted. There is a nasty illegal mine out on the bogs, but it's being dealt with.

text.ru: I believe it's copper. Other people in the copper mine also had stained skin.

text.fr: The water in the cave they were kept in was green as well. I believe it was contaminated with something.
text.ru: The water in the cave they were kept in was green as well. I believe it was contaminated with something.

text.fr: I think it's cave mushrooms. Their entire diet consisted of those for years upon years.
text.ru: I think it's cave mushrooms. Their entire diet consisted of those for years upon years.

text.ru: Thank you for your kind words, Mr. Holmes. Noone will ever harm them again.

text.fr: You're welcome to join us for dinner any time. I finally have someone to bake pies for!
text.ru: You're welcome to join us for dinner any time. I finally have someone to bake pies for!

text.ru: The children should be taken by the state. Two lives are a big responsibility.

text.en: I'm a railroad worker. There was an accident after we blasted a mountain, and I lost my arm.

text.ru: I'm a railroad worker. There was an accident after we blasted a mountain, and I lost my arm.

text.en: The railroad company refused to recognize that I lost my arm because of them. they told me, no indemnification. Go back to England.

text.en: So you saw an opportunity in this painter job and getting a pension.

text.ru: So you saw an opportunity in this painter job and getting a pension.

text.ru: I met Bennett in Kandahar, in the hospital. He was very bad already.

text.en: Bennett got gangrene and died one night. He had no family. I took his disk and I found clothes my size.

text.ru: Bennett got gangrene and died one night. He had no family. I took his disk and I found clothes my size.

text.en: Yes, I'm useless now, no one will hire a cripple.

text.fr: Yes, I'm useless now, no one will hire a cripple.
text.ru: Yes, I'm useless now, no one will hire a cripple.

text.fr: I have to report you. A life of fraud is not the path to follow. Cripple or not.
text.ru: I have to report you. A life of fraud is not the path to follow. Cripple or not.

text.fr: The trick that was played on you for the painting job has shown your greed.
text.ru: The trick that was played on you for the painting job has shown your greed.

text.fr: You won't get a wounded soldier pension in this life.
text.ru: You won't get a wounded soldier pension in this life.

text.en: Oh no, Mister Holmes, I should have never contacted you.

text.ru: You've been fooled, but you fooled yourself first.

text.ru: You took yourself for Zaccariah Bennett and then for a painting artist.

text.ru: Mr. Holmes, why did you talk to the administrator about the job?

text.ru: Now they want me to pay for the past months, do you understand what you have done?!

text.fr: Respecting rules is what you should have done. You were not honest with the people who feed and Shelter you.
text.ru: Respecting rules is what you should have done. You were not honest with the people who feed and Shelter you.

text.fr: ...and took my arm. condemning me to a life of poverty and dependence.
text.ru: ...and took my arm. condemning me to a life of poverty and dependence.

text.ru: Mr. Bennett, I successfully finished the investigation. The criminal was cached and will be punished.

text.ru: Oh, thank you, Mr. Holmes! You are the kindest soul of all Gollanza!

text.ru: It doesn't matter. Justice is only important, Mr. Bennett.

text.en: I do not know, sir, I do not know! When I came home, the devil had already taken her. Taken my dear Safiye...

text.en: Before dawn. I work until late night - me and Safiye both did our part for the family. Oh, I should not have left her that night!

text.ru: Do you suspect anybody?

text.en: My Safiye was like a fine rose. She drew stares! I was envied for her... But why kill her then, and not me? Why her?!
text.de: My Safiye was like a fine rose. She drew stares! I was envied for her... But why kill her then, and not me? Why her?!
text.fr: My Safiye was like a fine rose. She drew stares! I was envied for her... But why kill her then, and not me? Why her?!
text.ru: My Safiye was like a fine rose. She drew stares! I was envied for her... But why kill her then, and not me? Why her?!

text.fr: But how can I? Who could be this... fiend?! Who would do such a thing?
text.ru: But how can I? Who could be this... fiend?! Who would do such a thing?

text.fr: What ails your daughter?
text.ru: What ails your daughter?

text.en: A terrible affliction she was born with. Melisa used to get angry, see things, strike at Safiye and call her names.

text.fr: A terrible affliction she was born with. Melisa used to get angry, see things, strike at Safiye and call her names.
text.ru: A terrible affliction she was born with. Melisa used to get angry, see things, strike at Safiye and call her names.

text.en: Then a couple of months ago it changed - she became weak instead, bedridden. As if something sapped at her strength.
text.de: Then a couple of months ago it changed - she became weak instead, bedridden. As if something sapped at her strength.
text.fr: Then a couple of months ago it changed - she became weak instead, bedridden. As if something sapped at her strength.

text.ru: And you suspected nothing?

text.ru: I prayed for my daughter's health every day. Perhaps I have finally been heard?

text.ru: I found a threatening letter in your house. Do you know anything about it?

text.ru: How come your wife did not tell you about this?

text.ru: How can you say such a thing! Did we not have enough grief in this house?!

text.fr: Stay home with your daughter. Neither of you needs to suffer more, but this time you make things right.

text.en: I'm leaving

text.en: Ah, I see. This heathen, of course, who else could it be. No, she's not. She is her foster-mother.

text.fr: Rebecca is my daughter. I left her to Dorothy when she was a baby.
text.ru: Rebecca is my daughter. I left her to Dorothy when she was a baby.

text.en: Why did you do it?
text.de: Why did you do it?
text.fr: Why did you do it?
text.ru: Why did you do it?

text.en: The child was born out of wedlock. My parents wouldn't allow me to keep her. Said she was embarrasment for the family.
text.de: The child was born out of wedlock. My parents wouldn't allow me to keep her. Said she was embarrasment for the family.
text.fr: The child was born out of wedlock. My parents wouldn't allow me to keep her. Said she was embarrasment for the family.
text.ru: The child was born out of wedlock. My parents wouldn't allow me to keep her. Said she was embarrasment for the family.

text.fr: I'm here to bring this young lady back where she belongs. To her grave.
text.ru: I'm here to bring this young lady back where she belongs. To her grave.

text.fr: You are...insane.
text.ru: You are...insane.

text.fr: I can't allow you to do that. I'm her mother and she's going to stay.
text.ru: I can't allow you to do that. I'm her mother and she's going to stay.

text.fr: You'd better leave, sir. Or we will have to show you the way out.

text.ru: You have no heart, Sir. Fine. Twice as many and we're good?

text.fr: Enough talking. I'm taking the body, whether you like it or not.
text.ru: Enough talking. I'm taking the body, whether you like it or not.

text.ru: Kay sees, I didn't want this, but if I have to, I have to.

text.en: Come on, everyone can see those planks are the same as the ones you left. There is even the signboard! So, where are the goods and the money?
